程序包 com.teamone.unitask.onboard.controller

类 AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.onboard.controller.AuthController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000/", maxAge=3600L, allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/auth") public class AuthController extends Object
Controller class for the signup/login page.

    说明
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>
    authenticateUser(@Valid LoginRequest loginRequest)
    The sign-in method to verify the user by the email - password pair and generate JWT using the user's email, then return user id, username, user email, the JWT, and user roles, all wrapped in a JwtResponse object.

    Method to confirm the user's email address and enable the user.

  • 方法详细资料

    • authenticateUser

      @PostMapping("/signin") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> authenticateUser(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid LoginRequest loginRequest)
      The sign-in method to verify the user by the email - password pair and generate JWT using the user's email, then return user id, username, user email, the JWT, and user roles, all wrapped in a JwtResponse object.
      参数:
      loginRequest - The login request containing user email and password.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing JwtResponse or an error message.

    • registerUser

      @PostMapping("/signup") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> registerUser(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SignupRequest signUpRequest)
      The sign-up method that stores user information.
      参数:
      signUpRequest - The signup request containing user details.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing a success message or an error message.

    • confirmSignUp

      @GetMapping(path="/confirmSignUp") @Transactional public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> confirmSignUp(@RequestParam("token") String token)
      Method to confirm the user's email address and enable the user.
      参数:
      token - The confirmation token received via email.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity containing a success message or an error message.

    • getAllUser

      @GetMapping(path="getAllUsers") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\') or hasRole(\'MODERATOR\') or hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public List<User> getAllUser()
      Method to get all existing users.
      返回:
      A list of all existing users.
